Name: Detective
Text: (The mayor's campaign manager was half his age, with probably half the sense. He was a recent graduate looking to boost his resume, and he didn't let anything get in his way. Not tradition, red tape, or common sense.)

Name: Manager
Text: Hello, citizen. Are you by change registered to vote?

Name: Detective
Text: I've already cast my ballot but for a different race. The race to figure out who ended the mayor's. And my vote's for you.

Name: Manager
Text: Everything I do if for the good of this country! I'd never turn my back on it.

Name: Detective
Text: In my mind, the only platform a politician's got is lies. And you seem to have plenty.

Dialog.Name: Manager
Dialog.Text: That's your big evidence! Ha! Pathetic!

Dialog.Name: Detective
Dialog.Text: (Maybe I'm following the wrong lead here...)

Dialog.Name: Manager
Dialog.Text: That's your big evidence! Ha! Pathetic!
